entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Whale Cove
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:25 AM CST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 39.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind north 20 km/h. High minus 39. Wind chill near minus 57. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Temperature rising to minus 32 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 30 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 32 by morning. Wind chill minus 55 this evening and minus 48 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Blowing snow. Temperature falling to minus 35 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Blowing snow late in the morning and early afternoon. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 35 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 48 in the morning and minus 54 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 34. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 30.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 30. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 32. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CST Friday 27 January 2023
